sql.query: select a.seq_no as seq_no, isnull(sender,'') as sender, isnull(call_back,'') as call_back, isnull(send_msg,'') as send_msg, isnull(send_err, '') as send_err, isnull(createdate,'') as createdate, isnull(prname ,'') as prname , b.srvc_name as srvc_name from CYBER.DBO.CYBER_TBL_SMS_LP_MSG a, CYBER.DBO.CYBER_TBL_WB_SMS_CODE b where a.seq_no = ? and a.seq_no = b.seq_no

mapping.getProperty: seq_no, sender, call_back, send_msg, send_err, createdate, prname, srvc_name
